p: Compared to ethylene pathway, the number of miRNAs with targets on auxin pathway was at least two times higher (Fig. 6c,d). Between the cultivars, the miRNA number with targets in ethylene pathway was higher in both apical and basal spikelets of SR-159 than in SR-157 on day 0. On day 5, the number was higher in apical spikelet of SR-157 over SR-159, but there was no difference between the cultivars for basal spikelets. The situation changed on day 10 post anthesis, where the number of miRNAs was higher in SR-159 than in SR-157, especially in the apical spikelet.
